dcterms:description: A widely used speech translation benchmark dataset containing translations from English to 8 languages collected from TED Talks, with around 400 hours of audio recordings for each language direction.
dcterms:title: MuST-C

dcterms:description: A low-resource speech translation dataset for Maltese to English translation, used in the IWSLT 2023 low-resource track, with ASR data combined from official ST data and Common Voice.
dcterms:title: IWSLT 2023

dcterms:creator: Vassil Panayotov
Guoguo Chen
Daniel Povey
Sanjeev Khudanpur
dcterms:description: A public English ASR benchmark dataset based on audiobooks, containing 960 hours of audio.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech

dcterms:description: A collection of machine translation datasets used for training and evaluation, with a focus on various language pairs.

dcterms:description: A massively multilingual speech corpus designed for training and evaluating speech recognition systems.
